description:
The `Sidebar` component is related to the `SideNav` component
fromt he Material Design Docs.

A sidebar can be docked tot he left or right of the screen.

overlay.description: Boolean if the overlay should appear when opened.

isOpen.description: Boolean if the sidebar is visible and open.

fixed.description: Boolean if the sidebar is fixed to the side of the page.

responsive.description: Boolean if sidebar should be responsive.

header.description: An optional header to display above the children or list items.

children.description: Any children to display after the generated list of items.

transitionName.description: The transition name to use for the overlay.

transitionEnterTimeout.description: The enter timeout for the overlay transition.

transitionLeaveTimeout.description: The leave timeout for the overlay transition.

onOverlayClick.description:
An optional function to call when the overlay is clicked.
This should normally close the sidebar.

align.description: The position to align the sidebar of the screen to.

divider.name: bool
divider.description: Boolean if this item is a divider.

subheader.name: bool
subheader.description: Boolean if this item is a subheader.

primaryText.name: string
primaryText.description: The primary text to display in a `ListItem` or a `Subheader`.

items.description:
A list of item props to convert into `ListItem`, `Divider`, or
`Subheader` components.

##### Item Descriptions
